thread.title: BRIEF-Ping An Insurance Plans Funding For Partial Technology-Related Business To Maximise Shareholder Values

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ping An Insurance Plans Funding For Partial Technology-Related Business To Maximise Shareholder Values

organizations.name: reuters) - ping an insurance group co of china ltd

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Ping An Insurance Group Co of China Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS FUNDING FOR PARTIAL TECHNOLOGY-RELATED BUSINESS TO MAXIMISE SHAREHOLDER VALUES, IN RESPONSE TO REPORT ON IPO PLAN FOR ITS HEALTHCARE UNIT Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DrgWuV Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
